channel.title: Setting up your server after getting a vps?
channel.description: i was just wandering if anyone had a tutorial on what you do after getting a vps on lets say vpsland. like do you upload your sources file folder and tell it to run the run.bat or something? could someone please help me out?

item.title: Setting up your server after getting a vps?
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Rule 1

  1. All topics in this section must be requests for help on a server. Any non-server related questions will be locked. Requesting a host, ‘coder’/programmer, server or client, or asking about a VPS also falls under being non-server related. That means for other sections on this site too.
